skill.name: github-cli
skill.description: Encourages proactive use of GitHub CLI (gh) for gathering context on PRs, issues, comments, and repository information when working with GitHub-related tasks.
skill.summary: Encourages proactive use of GitHub CLI (gh) for gathering context on PRs, issues, comments, and repo...
skill.author: BfdCampos

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and best practices for using GitHub CLI. No executable code, no file access, no network calls. The skill guides AI behavior to proactively use gh commands for GitHub-related context gathering.

content.user_title: Gather GitHub context with gh CLI
content.value_statement: Working with GitHub issues and PRs without full context leads to misunderstandings and missed information. This skill teaches AI to proactively use GitHub CLI commands to retrieve PR descriptions, review comments, CI status, issue discussions, and repository information.
actual_capabilities: View PR details, diffs, and check CI status
Read PR comments, reviews, and discussion threads
Inspect issues with full comments and labels
List branches, releases, and workflow runs
Combine git commands with GitHub context
limitations: Requires GitHub CLI (gh) to be installed
Requires authentication with GitHub via gh auth
Only works with GitHub, not other Git platforms
Cannot modify GitHub data, read-only context gathering

use_cases.title: Review PRs with full context
use_cases.description: Pull PR descriptions, inline comments, review discussions, and CI status before diving into code changes.

use_cases.title: Understand issue discussions
use_cases.description: View complete issue threads with all comments, labels, and assignees before responding or debugging.

use_cases.title: Check CI/CD pipeline status
use_cases.description: Query workflow runs, check run status, and verify CI checks without opening a browser.

prompt_templates.title: View PR details
prompt_templates.prompt: Use gh pr view, gh pr diff, and gh pr checks to gather full context on the mentioned pull request.

prompt_templates.title: Check issue discussion
prompt_templates.scenario: When user asks about an issue
prompt_templates.prompt: Use gh issue view and gh api to retrieve all comments and discussion for this GitHub issue.

prompt_templates.title: Extract from GitHub URL
prompt_templates.prompt: Extract the owner, repo, and number from this URL, then use gh commands to gather relevant context.

prompt_templates.title: Combine git and gh
prompt_templates.prompt: First use git log for commits, then use gh commands to retrieve the PR discussion and CI status.

output_examples.input: Show me the context for PR #456 about the new authentication feature
output: ‚úì Description: Adds OAuth2 authentication flow with Google and GitHub providers
‚úì Key comments: Security review flagged token handling, now fixed

best_practices: Always use gh commands to gather context before responding to GitHub-related queries
Combine local git commands with GitHub CLI for complete picture
Use --json flag when you need structured data for parsing
anti_patterns: Relying only on local git when GitHub context (comments, reviews) is available
Opening a browser when gh commands can retrieve the information
Missing CI status checks before suggesting code changes

faq.question: Does this skill work with GitHub Enterprise?
faq.answer: Yes, gh supports GitHub Enterprise Server. Configure GH_HOST environment variable for your enterprise instance.

faq.question: What permissions does gh need?
faq.answer: gh requires authentication via gh auth login. It needs repo scope for full access to private repositories.

faq.question: Can I modify issues or PRs with this skill?
faq.answer: No, this skill focuses on read-only context gathering. Use gh issue comment or gh pr review for modifications.

faq.question: How does this compare to using git commands alone?
faq.answer: Git shows commits and branches. gh adds conversation context: PR descriptions, comments, reviews, CI status.

faq.question: Does this skill make network calls?
faq.answer: No, the skill is documentation-only. It invokes gh CLI which makes API calls to GitHub when you run commands.

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code when they have access to the gh CLI tool.
